divs: Sighting DetailsI had just parked my car in front of our house and was headed toward the stepsleading to the house when I glanced up and saw this spectacular display in themisty fog to the South East in the twilight. It looked like a comet with a hugeumbrella tail that looked like a jelly fish, luminous etc. It made no sound butslowly traced through the sky for about 20 seconds. Right when I started torealize what a beautiful and amazing sight it was, the ball disappeared in puffof smoke and trail slowly dissipated with some whisps floating over my house ahundred feet or so up. It was the prettiest thing Ive ever seen. Im guessing itmay be a fireball but Im hoping it was a craft of some sort.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Sausalito
There were no other sightings in Sausalito on or around October 14th 2002
